name: Yearn Finance
challengeTitle: Most Interesting Data Analysis or Monitoring of Yearn
challengeDesc: Create a dashboard or a monitoring tool to be able to check Yearn vaults, strategies, and the underlying protocols.
benefitIntro: Our team has fully integrated Yearn Vaults into our mobile platform.
benefit1: Our beautiful NEW native mobile UI/UX encourages monitoring & trading assets anywhere at anytime.
benefit2: Quickly and easily search by vault/strategy, address/name, strategist and more..
benefit3: Receive real-time health check & strategy notifications via Ava's Push Notification Service (APNS.io).
benefitClose: We will continue to research & explore new and better ways of integrating with Yearn Finance.
